content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the tartu county court the case involved two parties referred to as xx and kt xx is the owner of a property worth 35000 euros and wants to remove kt from the joint ownership of the property xx is willing to compensate kt with 60860 euros for their share the court has decided that xx will be the sole owner and kt must give their consent for the change in ownership kt must also agree to have their name removed from the propertys registry the court decision replaces kts previous intention to remove their name from the registry the costs of the legal proceedings will be shared by both parties if either party wants to appeal the decision they must do so within 30 days if no appeal is made the decision will be considered final the court found that the claim was justified and ordered the termination of joint ownership of the property the property now belongs solely to xx the court also ordered kt to give consent for the deletion of their ownership entry in the registry the court determined that the procedural costs will be divided between the parties based on the rules of the civil procedure code
